name: The Escape Game
description:
Hi! 

Welcome to my game. Guide the Hero and the Narrator through the dungeon to their goal, the fabled Keys of Escape. There's lots of ways to escape in this game, so look around, maybe come visit me if you can find me in there. Let me know if you spot any grammar or spelling mistakes, I think I squashed them all this time. And no, the wiggly red lines are on purpose, so those mistakes stay.  I suggest full-screen, and if you're having a hard time reading something, try highlighting it. 

Best of luck escaping!

<3 The Writer
